about.title: About me
about.me: Hi, I'm Haojie Huang, a passionate front-end developer transitioning into full-stack development. With a strong foundation in Vue 3, TypeScript, and modern web technologies, I enjoy building clean, scalable, and user-friendly applications. Currently, I'm expanding my expertise in backend technologies to become a well-rounded developer. I have a keen interest in open-source projects and love experimenting with new tools and frameworks. In my free time, I work on personal projects, continuously refining my skills and exploring innovative solutions.
